data.title: Super Mom
data.meta_description: One deserving woman will take the title as the Super Mom. The winner will receive $20,000, a two-page spread in Woman's World magazine, and a weekend getaway in Palm Springs, California. Will you take the SuperMom crown?
data.text:
Deb Stewart

2024 SUPER MOM

Deb is a mama of nine, a lupus warrior, and a cancer survivor who prioritizes faith above all. For her, the most rewarding part of motherhood is raising tiny humans, reveling in the love they give right back.

Jordin Sparks

PRESENTING HOST

Jordin Sparks, a Grammy-nominated singer and actress who gained fame as the youngest winner of American Idol in 2007, is well known for her powerful vocals and versatile talent. But to her 5-year-old son, she is best known as Mom! Balancing a successful career with raising a child, Sparks shared encouragement and glimpses of her motherhood journey with participating moms during the competition.

Womanâ€™s World is a feel-good publication filled with everything the reader needs to make her week better. As the #1 best-selling weekly women's magazine circulating to 1.6 million readers across the U.S., each issue covers everything from health to food to fashion, and soon...the 2024 Super Mom!

Palm Springs Paradise

The weekend getaway

The annual Super Mom gets whisked away on a luxurious vacation to the desert oasis of Palm Springs, CA, where she can bask in the sounds of sweet silence and enjoy a well-deserved weekend of relaxation, sun, and fun.

Victoria Ming

Competition Host

Victoria is a luxury real estate agent and former pageant titleholder as Miss World 2015. When she is not working, she enjoys modeling, acting, traveling with her husband and children, and supporting important charitable causes in her community. This mama of two offered competing moms advice and tips to get ahead during the competition.

London Reber

2023 Winner

London Reber, a devoted mother of three, draws inspiration from her late sister, Elizabeth, who faced health challenges with resilience. London, driven by faith, aims to embody love in thought, speech, and action. Her achievement as the first-ever Super Mom is a tribute to Elizabeth and a means to amplify the stories of fellow mothers for a stronger community.
